headline: Elon Musk boosts Tesla stake by $1B, Oracle gains on TikTok deal
summary: Yahoo Finance's John Hyland tracks today's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute, including Tesla (TSLA) CEO Elon Musk buying $1 billion worth of the EV maker's stock and Oracle (ORCL) jumping on the latest talks between US and China over a possible TikTok deal. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, withÂ Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.
